title: How to Screw the Post Office (Loompanics)
description:
The Post Office! Everybody complains about it, but nobody does anything about itÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½until now, that is. Now, Mr. Unzip reveals lots of ways your can send First Class Mail for lessÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½sometimes even for free!

    * How to fool the five billion dollars worth of Optical Character Readers and Bar Code Sorters the Post Office has installed in most sorting operations in the U.S. A
    * Finding the weaknesses in the P.O.'s high tech machines
    * How to send First Class letters for only 2ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ each

Each technique is illustrated with actual examples of how the author saved money on First Class postage. A hilarious commentary on the largest monopoly of our times, written in the form of a how-to-do-it manual, How To Screw The Post Office is sold for informational purposes only.
